question: Tottenham vs. Palace
description:
In the upcoming EPL game, scheduled for October 27, 3:00 PM ET: 

If Tottenham wins, this market will resolve to "TOT". If Palace wins or the game is a draw, this market will resolve to "CRY/Draw". 

If the game is not completed by November 3, 2023 (11:59 PM ET), the market will resolve to 50-50

question: [Single Market] Will Dean Phillips win the U.S. Democratic presidential nomination?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Dean Phillips wins the 2024 nomination of the Democratic Party for U.S. president. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of official Democratic Party sources, including https://democrats.org/.

Any replacement of the nominee before election day will not change the resolution of the market.

events.title: [Single Markets] Democratic Nominee 2024
events.description: This is a market on predicting the Democratic nominee for the 2024 presidential election.

question: Israel and Hamas ceasefire by Nov 30?
description: This market will resolve to "Yes" if there is an official ceasefire agreement, defined as a publicly announced and mutually agreed halt in military engagement, between Israel and Hamas by Nov 30, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. The resolution will be based on official government announcements from both Israel and Hamas, or reports from credible media sources. An official ceasefire agreement requires public recognition by both parties. Any form of informal, unratified, or verbal agreement will not be considered an official ceasefire. The ceasefire must last 48h and to have begun before the resolution date (if the ceasefire begins on Nov 29, for example, this market would resolve to "Yes" if the ceasefire continues for 48h).

events.title: Israel and Hamas ceasefire by Nov 30?
events.description: This market will resolve to "Yes" if there is an official ceasefire agreement, defined as a publicly announced and mutually agreed halt in military engagement, between Israel and Hamas by Nov 30, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. The resolution will be based on official government announcements from both Israel and Hamas, or reports from credible media sources. An official ceasefire agreement requires public recognition by both parties. Any form of informal, unratified, or verbal agreement will not be considered an official ceasefire. The ceasefire must last 48h and to have begun before the resolution date (if the ceasefire begins on Nov 29, for example, this market would resolve to "Yes" if the ceasefire continues for 48h).

question: Will Apple announce M3 Chip at its "Scary Fast" event?
description: This market will resolve to "Yes" if Apple Inc. publicly announces the M3 Chip at their Oct 30 "Scary Fast" event. To be considered an announcement, there must be a clear, public statement made by an authorized Apple representative during the event, acknowledging the M3 chip and its association with Apple. Any announcements made outside the official runtime of the event, or from unauthorized sources, will not be considered for the resolution of this market. Official Apple sources such as press releases, social media posts, or official livestreams will be used to confirm the announcement.

events.title: Will Apple announce M3 Chip at its "Scary Fast" event?
